text: A Lion in Town (Swedish: Lejon på stan) is a 1959 Swedish comedy movie directed by Gösta Folke and starring Nils Poppe, Ann-Marie Gyllenspetz, Herman Ahlsell, Jan-Erik Lindqvist, Sigge Fürst, Olof Thunberg, Git Gay, Åke Fridell. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 comedy movies Category:Swedish comedy movies
title: A Lion in Town
